item.title: 'What Photoshop fail?' Kim Kardashian defiantly reposts THAT squashy car photo... and blames a fan on the edit
item.description: You might think she is so used to looking at mirrors, she could never be caught out by one. But that is exactly what caused Kim's latest Photoshop fail, or so she claimed on Monday
item.content:encoded:
You might think she is so used to looking at mirrors, she could never be caught out by one.

But that is exactly what caused Kim Kardashian's latest Photoshop fail, or so she claimed on Monday.

The 37-year-old drew the scorn of many when she posted a photo on Instagram on Saturday, that was so heavily edited a car in the background had almost been crushed out of existence.

'What Photoshop fail?' Kim Kardashian defiantly reposted  THAT squashy car photo on Monday ... and blamed a fan on the edit

However on Monday the reality star defiantly reposted the image once again, with an explanation as to what had happened.

The KUWTK star gave her explanation to subscribers to her website in a post entitled 'What Photoshop fail?'.

'I’m seeing online and on news media outlets that I suffered a "Photoshop fail",' she scoffed. 'So ridiculous!'

'I reposted a picture on Instagram that a fan had already posted—I only added a filter to it.

Exhibit A: The 37-year-old claimed one of her fans had posted a mirror image pic, and that her crime was a cropping one

'It looks like the fan mirrored the photo, which is the reason the car looks like that.'

Indeed the mom-of-three posted what appeared to be the original pic, which was a mirror image duplicate.

Kim's digital crime was in fact a cropping one, as she failed to notice she had included some of the mirrored photo too, creating the bizarre 'crushed car' illusion that set the comments alight.

Out and about: Meanwhile husband Kanye West was spotted leaving Nobu in  Malibu with a pal

Chatty: The duo were in the midst of an animated conversation

'So, this is actually really funny to me!' she chortled in conclusion. 'Who would even Photoshop a car to look like that?! LOL'

Despite the innocent explanation, Kim still felt it necessary to switch off comments under her original post on Instagram. 

It's not the first time the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has been at the centre of a photoshop scandal.

She had a piece of her arm missing from a snap she posted with BFF Jonathan Cheban. 

Given the elbow: It's not the first time the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has been at the centre of a photoshop scandal, she had part of her arm missing in this pic she posted with BFF Jonathan Cheban

item.title: Happy in Hawaii! Ben Affleck beams at Lindsay Shookus during break from new movie… one week after cozy meet up with ex Jennifer Garner at church
item.description: Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck looked cozy together when they met up at church a week ago. But it looks as if the Oscar-winning Argo star is still going strong with the SNL producer Lindsay.
item.content:encoded:
Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck looked cozy together when they met up at church a week ago in Los Angeles.

But it looks as if the Oscar-winning Argo star - who recently showed off his large dragon tattoo on his back -  is still going strong with his New York-based love Lindsay Shookus.

On Sunday the lovebirds looked to be happier than ever as they held hands in Honolulu, Hawaii, after a breakfast date.

Still happy: Ben Affleck holds hands with his girlfriend Lindsay Shookus after a breakfast date in Honolulu, Hawaii on Sunday

Ben has been working on the Netflix show Triple Frontier with Charlie Hunnam and Oscar Isaac in Hawaii and it appears Lindsay was there to support him.

The Batman v Superman star, who wore a green shirt and grey shorts, was seen beaming at his blonde love interest who was clad in black-and-blue workout clothes.

They held hands and laughed as they made their way out of the casual restaurant.

There was no sign of the three kids he has with Garner: Violet, 12, Seraphina, nine, and Samuel, six.

In step: The Batman star, who wore a green shirt and grey shorts, was seen beaming at his blonde lady love who clad in black-and-blue workout clothes

UsWeekly recently claimed that the Massachusetts native 'loves and adores'  Shookus. 

But their relationship could ultimately be unrealistic as she lives in New York City, where she works as a producer at Saturday Night Live and raises a daughter (the father is ex Kevin Miller), and Ben  lives in Los Angeles, where he raises three kids with Garner.

Ben and Lindsay have been flying across the country regularly to keep their love alive. 

As far as his time with Garner a week ago, the exes looked like they were getting along well as they seemingly touched heads while tending to son Samuel.

She loves to support her man: Ben has been working on a Netflix show in Hawaii and it appears Lindsay was there to visit him. In his hand was takeout from the diner

The exes, who split nearly three years ago, mingled easily while holding red cups and looking at each other face to face.

If there was any animosity over past mistakes, it didn't seem to show. They also seemed to be happy talking to their friends and the three children.

Earlier, she looked like the ideal wife as she walked into church.

Not only did the 45-year-old appear incredibly fit in her chic outfit, but she also carried a basket of baked goods for her church friends.   

The photo that had everyone confused: Garner and Affleck looked cozy together when they met up at church a week ago in Los Angeles. They are looking down at son Samuel

Later Ben, 45, was seen walking to the church alone. Affleck wore a red shirt with blue New England Patriots Starter jacket and blue jeans and grey shoes for his casual Sunday attire.

This sighting comes days after an UsWeekly source claimed she and Ben may still be dragging their feet on finalizing their divorce because the Good Will Hunting actor has told friends that he would like to get back together with the beautiful brunette.

'He had at one point been telling friends he wanted his ex back,' a source told the magazine, even though he has been dating Shookus, 37. 

Doing what she loves: The mother of three has been sharing her recipes on Instagram

The Alias vet often shoots her photos inside her Pacific Palisades mansion

But then another source told UsWeekly he has not been looking back: 'When they filed and decided they were moving on, that was it.'

Also in the new article it was claimed that there was a chance they could have gotten back together in 2017.

'When Ben was in rehab, Jennifer was there every day, visiting,' said the insider. 

'They did family counseling to work on their relationship. Things looked positive. Jennifer was very caring, very present. They both wanted it to work.' 

There is also the issue of Ben and Jen's divorce. They have been working with a private mediator for years.

She  sure has a sense of humor: The Catch And Release star put on her band uniform to perform Happy Birthday as her pal Reese Witherspoon turned 42 last week

But they have still not sorted it all out, which suggests they are stalling in case they could reconcile.  

Two-time Academy Award winner Ben married 13 Going On 30 star Jennifer in 2005. 

He has also dated Gwyneth Paltrow and Jennifer Lopez. 

Triple Frontier also stars Pedro Pascal, Garrett Hedlund and Adria Arjona. Filming began on Monday.

But it looks as if the Oscar-winning Argo star - who recently showed off his large dragon tattoo on his back - is still going strong with his New York based love Lindsay Shookus. On Monday the lovebirds looked to be happier than ever as they held hands in Honolulu, Hawaii, after a breakfast date.

item.title: UK passports are to increase in price from TOMORROW (but it will be £10 cheaper to apply online rather than by post following the hike)
item.description: Currently a standard adult passport costs £72.50, but this will rise to £75.50 for applications made on the web, and be even more costly by post, rising to £85.
item.content:encoded:
Passports for children and adults are going to get more expensive from tomorrow - as the price is hiked for both online and postal applications.

Currently a standard adult passport or renewal costs £72.50, but this will rise to £75.50 for applications made on the web. 

It will be even more costly if you apply by post, setting holidaymakers back £85.

Charges for children's passports will go up from £46 they cost at the moment, to £49 online and £58.50 by mail. 

Passports for both children and adults are going to get more expensive from tomorrow

The £12.50 increase for the postal service represents a jump of 17 per cent for adults and 27 per cent for children. 

The changes will make the HM Passport Office an extra £50 million in 2018 to 2019.

The plans were passed earlier this month by a 317 to 258 majority in the House of Commons are part of a drive to increase the online services.

Up to 200 extra staff have been drafted in to handle the extra demand over the last few weeks, as travellers attempted to renew before the price increases. 

Travellers have until tomorrow to renew their passports before the price increases come into force

One in ten households in Great Britain do not have internet access, according to official figures. 

Explaining the changes, Immigration Minister Caroline Nokes said: "The passport is an invaluable document that allows millions of British people to travel around the world for business and pleasure.

Immigration minister Caroline Nokes who announced the changes

"Our priority is to ensure that UK travellers have a secure, effective, and efficient service from the point of application to the time they pass through the UK border and it is only right that we should look at this whole process when setting our fees.

"These proposals will ensure that those people who don't travel abroad are not footing the bill for those who do."

Labour has opposed the price increases saying some families could be forced to cancel travel plans.

Shadow Home Secretary Diane Abbott said: 'This whopping increase will hit families badly and could see some families being forced to cancel their summer holiday plans as the costs become too high.' 

Travellers can renew today to beat the hikes, but the rule is that any time left on any existing passport will be added to the new one, up to a maximum of nine months.  

 

118,000 join passport battle: Mail readers pile the pressure on MPs to STOP British passports being made abroad

David Churchill and John Stevens for the Daily Mail

The loss of UK jobs caused by the decision to make the new blue passports abroad is a betrayal of Brexit voters, it has been claimed

More than 118,000 readers have already signed the Daily Mail's petition demanding Britain's post-Brexit blue passports be made in the UK.

The huge response piled pressure on ministers and led to calls last night for a Parliamentary debate.

The tally surged to six figures within 36 hours of the petition's launch on Saturday, and last night passed the 118,000 mark.

It calls on ministers to think again after awarding the passport production contract to Franco-Dutch firm Gemalto, which will take over from British producer De La Rue – which has a printing plant in Gateshead – in 2019.

You can have your voice heard by signing our petition to have passports made in the UK by clicking here. 

If you are having technical difficulties with this link, simply copy and paste this address into your browser: www.dailymail.co.uk/passports or scroll down to the petition in this story.

 

Mail petition: Give the contract for the UK's new blue passport to a British firm 

The Government has decided Britain's post-Brexit blue passports should be made by a European company.

Now the Daily Mail and MailOnline are calling on ministers to put British workers first by reversing the decision and giving the contract to a British firm.

Simply enter your name, email address and home town into the form below to add YOUR voice - the total will be regularly refreshed so you can see how you've made a difference.

Be assured, your details will be kept confidential. If you can't see the entry form details, simply copy and paste this address into your browser www.dailymail.co.uk/passports

 

Last night there was praise for this newspaper's army of patriotic readers who have already signed up, and calls for a debate before the Government finalises the deal.

Labour MP and former minister John Spellar said the strength of support for the Mail's petition showed why the Speaker should hold a Commons debate. 'It is a hugely important issue,' he said. 'Ministers should come and explain why they are not backing British industry, and if they are claiming vast savings they should lay some figures before Parliament to justify that and not hide behind so-called commercial confidentiality.'

Former Ukip leader Nigel Farage said: 'This petition shows there's obviously massive support for this. It is the ultimate symbol of nationality. A Prime Minister who was elected on a slogan of Brexit means Brexit needs to show she means it.

'It's a completely outrageous idea that they should be printed in France. No other country in Europe would do this.

'A full debate needs to happen in Parliament before we issue the contract to a foreign company.'

Furious peers have called on Home Secretary Amber Rudd to rethink giving the lucrative contract to Gemalto

Gateshead Labour MP Ian Mearns said the decision was 'inexplicable', adding: 'Ministers need to come and explain if they have done an assessment ... of what the loss to the exchequer would be by this contract being awarded [abroad].'

Ministers face a week of grilling over the decision not to award the contract to a British firm after saying it was a result of EU competition rules. Labour MPs will today ask the Speaker to grant an urgent question so Home Secretary Amber Rudd or one of her junior ministers is summoned to the Commons to explain the choice of Gemalto.

Tomorrow, Theresa May is expected to be quizzed on the matter when she appears before the Commons liaison committee.

Then on Wednesday, Miss Rudd will be pressed on the issue at a session of the home affairs select committee before Mrs May faces MPs at PMQs. Parliament's e-petition page states that once an issue has attracted 10,000 signatures, there will be a guaranteed Government response. Upon 100,000 signatures, the issue must be considered for a full debate in Parliament. Such petitions are almost always debated.

Our petition was launched on MailOnline after a deluge of calls and letters from readers.

Among the concerns they raised were that hundreds of jobs could be lost at the Gateshead site and that handing data on British citizens to a foreign firm could increase the risk of hackers successfully targeting sensitive information.

Others said producing the blue documents abroad made a mockery of Mrs May's claim their re-introduction would be an 'expression of our independence and sovereignty' post-Brexit.

On Saturday, Unite union chief Len McCluskey branded ministers' decision the 'passport betrayal', saying it was 'not about red versus blue' but 'saving decent British jobs'. He added ministers should 'back Britain's workers and make our passports truly something to be proud of'. Tory MPs have made similar calls.

This is the Polish factory owned by Gemalto that could make Britain's post-Brexit blue passports

Several countries sidestep EU competition rules and insist on their passports being made at home for national security reasons. Germany, Spain, Italy and France all award contracts to domestic makers.

EU rules on public procurement were designed to obtain better value for taxpayers by ensuring public contracts above certain thresholds are awarded through 'transparent, non-discriminatory and competitive tender procedures'. But countries can rely on a 'national security' exemption to justify directly awarding contracts.

Osborne dragged into row over blue passports 

George Osborne has been dragged into the row after it emerged a firm he works for owns part of Gemalto. 

He is paid £650,000 a year as an adviser to fund managing firm BlackRock, which has a 2.67 per cent stake in the Franco-Dutch firm.

Mr Osborne insisted attacking the outsourcing decision was 'hypocrisy'.

 He tweeted a link to an Evening Standard article that said: 'Surely this is exactly the kind of global free trade the Brexiteers told us they were all in favour of?' 

There is no suggestion Mr Osborne or BlackRock were involved in Gemalto's bid.
item.dc:abstract: Currently a standard adult passport costs £72.50, but this will rise to £75.50 for applications made on the web, and be even more costly by post, rising to £85. Charges for children's passports will go up from £46 they cost at the moment, to £49 online and £58.50 by mail. The £12.50 increase for the postal service represents a jump of 17 per cent for adults and 27 per cent for children. The changes will make the HM Passport Office an extra £50 million in 2018 to 2019.

item.title: PICTURED: Four-year-old boy is attacked and 'shaken to death' by his family dog while playing in his backyard in Texas
item.description: The 'mixed large breed' was tied up, but it seems the boy got too close to it and relatives looked out of the window to see the animal's mouth clamped over the boy's neck in Texas.
item.content:encoded:
A four-year-old boy has died after he was shaken to death by his family dog.

Noah Trevino was playing in the backyard of his home in Texas when the dog fatally attacked him.

The 'mixed large breed' was tied up, but it seems the boy got too close and relatives looked out of the window to see the animal's mouth clamped over the boy's neck.

Scroll down for video 

Noah Trevino (pictured) was playing in the backyard of his home in Texas when the dog fatally attacked him

The 'mixed large breed' (seen above) was tied up, but it seems the boy got too close and relatives looked out of the window to see the animal's mouth clamped over the boy's neck

Emergency services are seen above outside Noah's home after the responded to the attack

The Bexar County Sheriff Javier Salazar told KSAT: 'It appears that the child may have gotten too close to the dog.

'One of the relatives of the child actually looked out into the backyard and saw that the dog had his mouth around the little boy's neck and was shaking him.'

The youngster was found lifeless in the garden, Salazar said, and his family tried in vein to administer first aid. 

Noah was airlifted to hospital, but he was declared dead as soon as he arrived. 

Noah is seen in a Facebook photo with Father Christmas. He was airlifted to hospital, but he was declared dead as soon as he arrived

The 'mixed large breed' was tied up, but it seems the boy got too close to it and relatives looked out of the window to see the animal's mouth clamped over the boy's neck. Pictured is the house

The backyard which Noah Trevino was playing in when the family dog fatally attacked him 

Salazar told KSAT: 'This was a family dog. Even if the dog doesn't show any outward signs of aggression, sometimes they can be unpredictable. 

'So, it's best to always be vigilant when you're dealing with a small child and a dog like that.'

Bexar County Animal Control seized the dog, which is scheduled to be destroyed today.
item.dc:abstract: A four-year-old boy has died after he was understood to have been shaken to death by his family dog. Noah Trevino (seen left) was playing in the backyard of his home in Texas when the dog (seen right) fatally attacked him. The 'mixed large breed' was tied up, but it seems the boy got too close and relatives looked out of the window to see the animal's mouth clamped over the boy's neck.

item.title: Made in Chelsea's Jamie Laing, 29, enjoys a romantic evening at the theatre alongside girlfriend Heloise Agostinelli, 19... after she makes her MIC debut
item.description: The reality star, 29, and the 19-year-old coyly left London's Jermyn Street Theatre together after watching Cressida Bonas in stage show The Dog Beneath the Skin.
item.content:encoded:
Last month, he revealed he had found love again with the daughter of an Italian American self made billionaire financier.

And now Jamie Laing has stepped out with his new squeeze Heloise Agostinelli, who is 10 years his junior, following her debut on Monday night's Made In Chelsea.

The reality star, 29, and the 19-year-old coyly left London's Jermyn Street Theatre together after watching Cressida Bonas in stage show The Dog Beneath the Skin.

Date night: Jamie Laing has stepped out with his new squeeze Heloise Agostinelli, who is 10 years his junior, following her debut on Monday night's Made In Chelsea

Appearing in jovial spirits, Jamie looked smart in a pair of grey fitted suit trousers with a grey T-shirt underneath a stylish wool coat.

The E4 star teamed the ensemble with a pair of brown-coloured loafers while accessorising the look with a long chain, statement watch and a sprinkling of rings across his hands.

Attempting to remain incognito, Jamie's other half Heloise, who was introduced on Monday's MIC affectionately as Ell, showcased her slender pins in a black corduroy mini skirt.

She teamed the garment with an oversized grey jumper and nineties-inspired black bomber jacket while her brunette tresses fell down her shoulders in a sleek straight style.

Stepping out: The reality star, 29, and the 19-year-old coyly left London's Jermyn Street Theatre together after watching Cressida Bonas in stage show The Dog Beneath the Skin

United: Jamie and Heloise made their outing together just over a month after reports circulated about their romance

Jovial: Appearing in jovial spirits, Jamie looked smart in a pair of grey fitted suit trousers with a grey T-shirt underneath a stylish wool coat

All in the details: The E4 star teamed the ensemble with a pair of brown-coloured loafers while accessorising the look with a long chain, statement watch and a sprinkling of rings across his hands

The Made In Chelsea star has been keeping coy on his relationship with Heloise until now and she was introduced on the much-loved series following his fling with South African Melody.

In February MailOnline revealed that her father is Robert Agostinelli, is the 416th richest American, according to Forbes. 

While Heloise's mother is Mathilde Favier-Meyer, a Public Relations Manager at Dior Couture, so the teen is a well-known face on the social circuit.  

Jamie previously confirmed his new relationship - and that they're a decade apart in age. 

Shy: Attempting to remain incognito, Jamie's other half Heloise, who was introduced on Monday's MIC affectionately as Ell, showcased her slender pins in a black corduroy mini skirt

Then: In February MailOnline revealed that her father is Robert Agostinelli, is the 416th richest American, according to Forbes

Happy: While Heloise's mother is Mathilde Favier-Meyer, a Public Relations Manager at Dior Couture, so the teen is a well-known face on the social circuit. Jamie previously confirmed his new relationship - and that they're a decade apart in age

Nothing to see here! Heloise attempted to exit the stage show unnoticed, covering her face with her clutch bag

Loved-up: The couple made enjoyed their outing together just as Heloise made her debut on Made in Chelsea on Monday night

'I have been having a lot of date nights with this new mon amis [my friend] and it is actually making me slightly excited and giddy for life,' he told The Sun. 'She’s 19! So what? It doesn’t make a difference.

'I will never ever be in the same decade as her. When I turn 30, she turns 20.'

His female companion was first seen on Jamie's arm as they left Spencer Matthews and Vogue Williams' engagement drinks last month.

The new romance comes following his split from Frankie Gaff last summer. 

Debut: Heloise made her debut on MIC on Monday night, joining Jamie at cast mate Mimi Bouchard's pyjama party

Sealed with a kiss: They pair shared a passionate kiss on the show

Shinning star: Actress Cressida Bonas was pictured leaving the venue after her performance

Low-key: The stage star wore a casual look, sporting a simple leather biker jacket and paperbag trousers as she made her way out of the theatre after the performance

Relaxed: Cressida styled her brown bobbed tresses into simple flicked waves, with barely-there makeup highlighting her flawless complexion

Stylish: After another triumphant performance, the ex-girlfriend of Prince Harry made her way out of the theatre, carrying her essentials in a blue croc-skin bag

Treading the boards: Cressida's stint on The Dog Beneath The Skin is almost at an end finishing this Saturday (March 31)

item.title: When in Rio! Victoria's Secret model Izabel Goulart strips down to a sexy string bikini as she sunbathes in Brazil during a quick spring break
item.description: Izabel Goulart has become one of the top models in the business because she has incredible curves that make lingerie and bikinis look exceptional.
item.content:encoded:
Izabel Goulart has become one of the top models in the business because she has incredible curves that make lingerie and bikinis look exceptional.

And on Sunday the bombshell proved that she is only getting better in her thirties as she showed off her nearly six-foot frame in a black two piece while walking on the Copacabana beach in Rio de Janeiro, a massive seaside city in Brazil.

The Victoria's Secret vet, 33, showed off her cover girl smile as she let her hair down while getting her feet wet with friends. 

Scroll down for video 

Lovely lady: Stunning model Izabel Goulart modeled a sexy black string bikini as she walked on the Copacabana beach in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, on Sunday 

All the right curves: The bombshell proved that she is only getting better in her thirties as she showed off her nearly six-foot frame as she enjoyed the massive seaside city in Brazil

Izabel, who dates Kevin Trapp, wore a black bikini that had a triangle top and string bottoms that were tied on the sides and also showed off plenty of backside.

The catwalk princess also wore gold-rimmed sunglasses with yellow tinted lenses and had on small pieces of gold jewelry.

Her body looked very toned with lean legs and arms and her abs were shows. 

The star, who was born in Brazil, was discovered at age 14 and started modeling soon after in Sao Paulo. 

A 10: Izabel, who dates Kevin Trapp, wore a black bikini that had a triangle top and string bottoms that were tied on the sides and also showed off plenty of backside

Le look de IG: The catwalk princess also wore gold-rimmed sunglasses with yellow tinted lenses and had on small pieces of gold jewelry. Her body looked very toned with lean legs and arms and her abs were shows

A body to be proud of: The brunette looker made an impression in Europe at the fashion shows for Alberta Ferretti, Balenciaga, Bottega Veneta, Givenchy, Oscar de la Renta, Valentino, Chanel, and Dolce And Gabbana. In 2005, Goulart appeared on the covers of the April edition of Marie Claire France and, in December, Vogue Brazil

More background: In 2008, she replaced fellow Victoria's Secret Angel Alessandra Ambrosio as the face of A/X Armani Exchange. She also graced the cover of the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue in 2011

Here the Elle model is seen running up the shore

The brunette looker - who is of Italian and Portuguese descent - made an impression in Europe at the fashion shows for Alberta Ferretti, Balenciaga, Bottega Veneta, Givenchy, Oscar de la Renta, Valentino, Chanel, and Dolce And Gabbana. 

In 2005, Goulart appeared on the covers of the April edition of Marie Claire France and, in December, Vogue Brazil.

In 2005, she entered the fold of Victoria's Secret, walking in their famed fashion show and starred in every show until 2016. 

In 2008, she replaced fellow Victoria's Secret Angel Alessandra Ambrosio as the face of A/X Armani Exchange. 

She also graced the cover of the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue in 2011.

Her other big covers have been for Vogue, GQ, Marie Claire, Glamour and Elle.  

Izabel doesn't only model; she has also acted in movies as she appeared opposite The Rock, Alexandra Daddario, Kelly Rohrbach and Zac Efron in Baywatch.

Izabel told HeyUGuys of her reaction when she discovered she had bagged the role: 'I had so [many] butterflies in my stomach.

'All I wanted to do wanted to scream out loud, but I couldn't, because I was right about 10 to 15 minutes away from hitting a runway.'

She said she had to channel her joyous adrenaline amid receiving the great news, adding: 'It was very special - I walked that runway feeling very good.' 

Snack time: The stunning brunette stopped by a snack shop on the sand

Time to wash off the sand: After a day on the sand, she took some time to clean herself in an outdoor shower

All done: The looker appeared to be alone during her beach day as there was no sign of her beau Trapp

Posing with a fan? Here the Entourage actress was arm-in-arm with a handsome twentysomething man with several tattoos

Fresh drnk: Izabel enjoyed a fresh drink on the sand

item.title: Billionaire Elon Musk's father, 72, claims baby he had with his own step-daughter, 30, was the result of a 'one off mistake' when she split up with her boyfriend and turned to him for comfort
item.description: The baby he fathered by his own step-daughter was as the result of a one-off ‘mistake’, Errol Musk – the South African father of the tech billionaire Elon Musk, has revealed.
item.content:encoded:
The baby he fathered by his own step-daughter was as the result of a one-off 'mistake', Errol Musk – the South African father of the tech billionaire Elon Musk, has revealed.

The 72-year-old has been accused of bringing 'shame on the family' by his ex-wife and mother of Jana Bezuidenhout who is 42 years younger than the wealthy businessman.

Errol disclosed that his sixth child, Elliot Rush, was conceived 'in the heat of the moment' after Jana had been thrown out by her boyfriend.

Billionaire Elon Musk's estranged father has had a baby with his own stepdaughter who is 42 years his junior, MailOnline revealed

Errol Musk, 72, father of the Tesla Motors chief, has a 10-month-old baby boy called Elliot Rush Musk with his stepdaughter Jana Bezuidenhout, 30 (pictured)

'I do not want to call it a mistake because no child wants to hear that they were a mistake,' he told Rapport newspaper. 

'It happened one evening when Jana's boyfriend threw her out of the house and she had slept over at my house. You have to understand – I've been single for 20 years and I'm just a man who makes mistakes.'

He said Jana and their son now lived on the same property as him, in Langebaan, an hour outside Cape Town, but they are not in a relationship.

The extraordinary revelation by MailOnline last week offered an explanation for the bitter family feud that has engulfed one of the world's richest families. 

Errol was branded 'evil' and 'a terrible human being' by Elon Musk, the Tesla Motors chief, who said his father had done 'almost every evil thing you can possibly think of'.

Thirty-year-old Jana's mother, Heidi-Mari Musk described her former husband as 'a bad man' who had 'ruined everything' for the family.

Jana (pictured) was four years old when Errol married her mother, Heide. Errol's relationship with Jana is said to be one of the reasons he is estranged from his billionaire son, Elon 

Jana is pictured here last year with her mother Heide cradling Elliot Musk, who is the baby son of her former husband and her daughter. Next to them is her daughter with Errol, Asha Muak

Jana (pictured) lived with Elon when she was growing up. Heide, his second wife, was a widow with three young children when she met Errol. Her first husband died in a car crash and Errol helped raise her little ones Jock junior, Jana and Harry

'He has caused an incredible amount of pain for me and his children and now brought shame on the family again. We are furious that he could make his own stepchild pregnant. And that he blows it out for the world.

'We have tried to get peace in our hearts, but he has now ruined everything,' she told the newspaper.

Heide, his second wife, was a widow with three young children when she met Errol. Her first husband died in a car crash and Errol helped raise her little ones Jock junior, Jana and Harry.

Errol already had three children of his own from his first marriage to High School sweetheart, the model and socialite Maye Haldeman – Elon, his brother Kimbal and sister Tosca. Errol and Heide had two daughters called Alexandra 'Ali' Musk and Asha 'Rose' Musk.

Errol is pictured here holding his son Elon as a baby. He says he gave Elon and his two siblings a luxury upbringing in Pretoria before Elon earned his first billion dollars at the age of 30

Elon Musk stands beside a rocket on March 19, 2004 in El Segundo, Los Angeles. He is worth £20 billion and launched a Tesla car into space - but has not spoken to his father for 18 months

In a recent interview Errol (pictured) admitted that his 30-year-old girlfriend 'Jana' had given birth to his baby, although he failed to disclose that she was his stepdaughter

Asked for his response to Heide's criticism, Errol today said he found it strange that she had lashed out at him, claiming that she begged him to take her back 'every month'.

Elon, the 46-year-old SpaceX founder who has a £20 billion fortune, reportedly went 'berserk' when he learned that his step-sister Jana, who lived with him as a youngster, was having his father's child.

The space explorer spared no punches in an interview with American Rolling Stone magazine about his feelings towards his father.

'He was such a terrible human being, you have no idea,' he said with tears running down his face.

'My dad will have a carefully thought-out plan of evil. He will plan evil. Almost every crime you can possibly think of, he has done. Almost every evil thing you could possibly think of, he has done. It's so terrible, you can't believe it.'
item.dc:abstract: The baby he fathered by his own step-daughter was as the result of a one-off ‘mistake’, Errol Musk (left) – the South African father of the tech billionaire Elon Musk (bottom insert), has revealed. The 72 year-old has been accused of bringing ‘shame on the family’ by his ex-wife and mother of Jana Bezuidenhout (right) who is 42 years younger than the wealthy businessman. Errol disclosed that his sixth child, Elliot Rush (top insert), was conceived ‘in the heat of the moment’ after Jana had been thrown out by her boyfriend.
item.dc:creator: Khaleda Rahman
item.mi:shortTitle: Errol Musk says tot with step-daughter was result of 'one off mistake'

item.title: Michael Buble's model wife Luisana confirms she is pregnant with couple's third child as she showcases her baby bump at red carpet event
item.description: There's been plenty of speculation that whether they have another baby on the way.
item.content:encoded:
Michael Buble and his model wife Luisana Lopilato have confirmed they are expecting their third child together. 

The couple addressed weeks of speculation as they appeared at the Juno Awards in Vancouver, Canada, on Saturday night, with Luisana, 30, debuting her baby bump as she hit the red carpet with the singer, 42. 

Buble reminded the audience that five years ago, when he hosted the Canadian music festival in Regina, she was expecting their first child. 

Three is the magic number: Michael Buble and his model wife Luisana Lopilato have confirmed they are expecting their third child together 

'Oops you did it again... my wife and I are pregnant with our number three!' Buble said as the audience cheered the revelation. 

It was reported last week that the couple are expecting a baby girl in around four months time, but the Canadian crooner didn't reveal the gender of the tot. 

The new baby will  be a third child for the singer and his wife, who also have four-year-old Noah and two-year-old Elias.

Their parenthood journey hasn't been easy, with the couple devastated when Noah was diagnosed with liver cancer back in 2016, but luckily the youngster was confirmed to be making a recovery towards the end of last year.

Happy news: The couple addressed weeks of speculation as they appeared at the Juno Awards in Vancouver, Canada, on Saturday night 

Bumping along: Luisana, 30, debuted her baby bump in a stunning plunging black gown as she hit the red carpet with the singer, 42

And now Michael - who took home the award for Adult Contemporary Album of the Year at the 2018 Juno Awards - said he will start enjoying life more.

He told Entertainment Tonight Canada: 'Emotionally, it's a roller coaster. I think life sort of teaches you these hard lessons sometimes.

'Part of that lesson is that it allowed me to really have perspective, and to really enjoy more than I ever have in my life.

'I enjoy the small things.' 

Oh baby: The couple looked delighted as they hit the red carpet at the music event, with Luisana placing a protective hand on her beautiful bump

Doting dad: Buble reminded the audience that five years ago, when he hosted the Canadian music festival in Regina, she was expecting their first child

Big brood: The new baby will be a third child for the 42-year-old singer and his wife, who also have four-year-old Noah and two-year-old Elias 

Noah was diagnosed with cancer in 2016 but the Haven't Met You Yet hitmaker has previously confirmed he has been 'progressing well' following his treatment.

Speaking previously, he said: 'We are so grateful to report that our son Noah has been progressing well during his treatment and the doctors are very optimistic about the future for our little boy.

'He has been brave throughout and we continue to be inspired by his courage. We thank God for the strength he has given all of us.' 

Proud parents: The new baby is thought to be a girl
item.dc:abstract: There's been plenty of speculation that whether they have another baby on the way. And Michael Buble confirmed that his actress wife Luisana Lopilato is indeed expecting, as he took to the stage at the Juno Awards on Saturday. The singer reminded the audience that five years ago, when he hosted the Canadian music festival in Regina, she was expecting their first child.
item.dc:creator: Lizzie Smith
item.mi:shortTitle: Michael Buble's model wife Luisana confirms she is pregnant

item.title: Stranger Things couple Natalia Dyer and Charlie Heaton pose separately on the red carpet at PaleyFest following split rumors
item.description: Dyer, who plays Nancy Wheeler on the show, wore a Delpozo dress with a white top with straps and a plunging top, with a seafoam green dress and off-white Christian Louboutin heels.
item.content:encoded:
They're one of young Hollywood's most adorable pairings - but have recently been hit with breakup rumors.

And curiously Charlie Heaton and Natalia Dyer decided to pose for photos separately at Sunday's PaleyFest event in Hollywood before sitting down to discuss their hit show Stranger Things. 

Dyer, who plays Nancy Wheeler on the show, wore a Delpozo dress with a white top with straps and a plunging front with a seafoam green skirt, and off-white Christian Louboutin heels. 

Scroll down for video 

On or off?: Stranger Things' Natalia Dyer and Charlie Heaton posed separately on the red carpet before the PaleyFest event on Sunday amid split rumors

Perfect pairing: Dyer, 21, and Heaton, 24, sat down for a chat about Netflix hit Stranger Things 

The 21-year-old Nashville native had her dark locks pulled back, with wisps of hair protruding and a light layer of makeup. 

Heaton, 24, wore a dark seaweed green suit with an untucked black button-down shirt, black boots with blue laces, and a watch.

The English actor, who plays Jonathan Byers on the show, had his dark locks parted in the middle.

The outing came after a source told Life & Style earlier this month: 'Charlie broke it off with Natalia. She’s heartbroken. She doesn’t know what went wrong.' 

But confusing matters even more the duo were spotted looking pretty happy and posing together at a Dior event on March 15 shortly after split reports emerged. 

Dyer recently revealed that she and her beau keep things light on the set of the show, as do most of her co-stars.

Professionals: The duo looked relaxed as they discussed the show despite it being reported earlier this month that they'd split 

Keeping it light: Dyer said she and Heaton 'goof off a lot' on the set of the show during filming

Winning formula: Dyer said that her character, Nancy Wheeler, and Heaton's Jonathan Byers, have a complementary effect on one another 

'He’s great. It’s a lot of fun, we goof off a lot,' she told US. 'The whole cast does. We’re all very close so we always have a great time on and off [set] ... sometimes it’s even hard to stop laughing, stop goofing off. It’s been really lovely!'

She said that the chemistry between her character and Heaton's is of the 'push-pull' variety, and that 'there’s some tension there,' as she thinks 'they probably fight a lot.'

She continued, 'They’ve both had this shared trauma. They’ve both gone through this experience together and I think that brings people closer.'

She said that the characters have had a complementary effect on each other since the show's inception.

'I think also what was kind of cool about Jonathan and Nancy, especially in season one, was that they brought out qualities in each other that maybe weren’t there without the other,' she said.

Lovebirds: The Netflix co-stars have been romantically linked since last year 

Ensemble: Actor Wil Wheaton moderated the panel, which included (L-R) Shawn Levy, Winona Ryder, Sean Astin, Paul Reiser, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Browmn, Caleb McLaughlin, Sadie Sink, Dyer and Heaton

item.title: Former New Orleans Saints cheerleader sues the team, claiming she was fired for violating its rules when she posed in a one-piece swimsuit
item.description: Bailey Davis said she was fired after three years with the New Orleans NFL team, who claimed she had violated its extremely strict code of conduct. Davis denies breaching the policy.
item.content:encoded:
A former New Orleans Saints cheerleader is suing the franchise after she claims she was fired for posting a picture of herself in a one-piece swimsuit.

Bailey Davis said she was fired after three years with the NFL team, who claimed she had violated its extremely strict code of conduct. 

The Saints officials accused her of appearing nude, semi-nude or in lingerie and attending a party with the franchise's football players - both of which are prohibited.

Davis denied she breached any protocols and has now filed a complaint with the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission.

Bailey Davis posing in a one-piece swimsuit in a photograph posted on her Instagram account in April. It is not clear whether or not this is the picture at the heart of the lawsuit

Bailey Davis (pictured) said she was fired after three years with the New Orleans Saints (left), who claimed she had violated its extremely strict code of conduct

Another picture of Bailey Davis in a swimsuit. This time a different pink one-piece. This photograph was uploaded to her Twitter account in February

Bailey Davis during her time as a New Orleans Saints cheerleader performs at an NFL game at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome on December 17, 2017 in New Orleans, Louisiana

The photograph appeared on the cheerleader's Instagram page in January, according to The New York Times. 

But Saints cheerleaders are bound by rigorous contracts which forces them to abide by a number of rules, the paper reported.  

When it comes to their social media accounts, they have to be kept private and they are not permitted to allow playing members of staff to follow them. 

The ban stretches even further than that, a handbook and internal emails seen by The Times suggests. 

If a cheerleader is dining at a restaurant and a player walks in, they are expected to leave. 

They are to avoid all and any contact - be it online or in person - with players, but the players are not bound by the same rules.

Despite working for and being employed by the New Orleans Saints, the cheerleaders are not allowed to wear the franchise's merchandise, according to the paper.

Officials say the rules are in place to stop players preying on cheerleaders, even though the onus is on the women to fend off the men and block them from their social media accounts. 

Davis (pictured) denied she breached any protocols and has now filed a complaint with the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission

Davis' case is based on the NFL's equal opportunity stance, and she says the regulations she had to follow violates the policy because they only apply to women

Sara Blackwell, Davis' lawyer, told The New York Times: 'If the cheerleaders can't contact the players, then the players shouldn't be able to contact the cheerleaders.

'The antiquated stereotype of women needing to hide for their own protection is not permitted in America and certainly not in the workplace.'

Davis' case is based on the NFL's equal opportunity stance, and she says the regulations she had to follow violates the policy because they only apply to women.  

A lawyer representing the Saints in the case told the paper the organization 'strives to treat all employees fairly'. 

The attorney said: 'At the appropriate time and in the appropriate forum, the Saints will defend the organization's policies and workplace rules. 

'For now, it is sufficient to say that Ms Davis was not subjected to discrimination because of her gender.'
item.dc:abstract: A former New Orleans Saints cheerleader is suing the franchise after she claims she was fired for posting a picture of herself in a one-piece swimsuit. Bailey Davis said she was fired after three years with the NFL team, who claimed she had violated its extremely strict code of conduct. The Saints officials accused her of appearing nude, semi-nude or in lingerie and attending a party with the franchise's football players - both of which are prohibited. Davis denied she breached any protocols and has now filed a complaint with the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission.

item.title: 'Bikini life in paradise': Brooke Shields, 52, stuns in a two-piece black swimsuit while enjoying tropical vacation
item.description: Brooke Shields is 'in vacation mode.' The 52-year-old actress shared some envy-worthy snaps of her tropical getaway, flaunting her sensational body in a black-and-white bikini.
item.content:encoded:
Brooke Shields has ditched her famous Calvins and is now 'in vacation mode.'

On Sunday, the 52-year-old actress shared some envy-worthy snaps of her tropical getaway, flaunting her sensational body in a black-and-white bikini.

In the photos, the mother-of-two put her best assets on display, posing on a set of wooden stairs that led to the picturesque beach.

Scroll down for video  

'Bikini life': Brooke Shields, 52, stuns in a two-piece black swimsuit as she poses on a set of wooden stairs during a tropical getaway 

She captioned the set of pictures: 'Bikini life in paradise,' accompanied by a palm tree emoji. 

The two-time Golden Globe nominee went au naturel, showing off her flawless skin and fresh vacation tan. 

She kept her accessories to a minimum, wearing a few bracelets around her wrist and she let her long brown hair down naturally. 

In an interview with Health magazine, the Vogue cover girl shared that she's learned to love her body, saying: 'I was always considered the athletic one, and that translated into big. I was the big one. Thankfully, so many more body types are accepted these days.' 

Au naturel: The mother-of-two looked relaxed and showed off her best assets in a set of Instagram photos 

She added that she often works out with a personal trainer and loves moves like, 'hanging upside down in inversion boots, doing hamstring pulls and sit-ups. I'm amazed at how great it feels on my back.'

Brooke also spilled that she lets herself indulge in her favorites treats, like ice cream or wine, every once in awhile so that she sets herself up for 'success.' And all her efforts seem to have paid off.  

In another snap posted on Thursday, the brunette beauty took a dip in a pool as she looked out on the ocean to appreciate the spectacular view.

The model and actress seems to be enjoying her break from reality, captioning the photo: 'Out of office and into vacation mode.' 

'Vacation mode': The model and actress enjoyed the stunning view as she took a quick dip in a pool 

In a fun video posted on Saturday, Brooke is seen enjoying an 'afternoon joyride' as the 6ft stunner jet skis on the pristine ocean water.

The Blue Lagoon actress was ready for the adventure, wearing a light blue printed rash guard under a dark blue life jacket.  

And it seems the vacation came at just the right time. The star has had an incredibly busy schedule lately - juggling four TV and film projects in the last year.   

Guest star: The busy entrepreneur recently reprised her stint as 'renowned actress and supermodel' River Fields on the CW's Jane the Virgin 

The author of six books recently reprised her guest stint as 'renowned actress and supermodel' River Fields in the March 16 episode of The CW's Jane the Virgin. 

The star is also the voice of 'a very bad dog' on the Adult Swim cartoon Mr. Pickles. The show's third season premiered on Cartoon Network last month. 

And even though she has an impressive 96 credits on her IMDB, the veteran actress still has to practice for upcoming gigs.

In a candid photo shared last week, Brooke was seen reading over a green script and 'running lines,' for an upcoming project.

'Running lines': Brooke, who has an impressive 96 credits on her IMDB, shared a photo last week of her reading over a script for one her upcoming projects

item.title: EXCLUSIVE - 'He didn't even want to re-commit': Married At First Sight's Telv Williams and Sarah Roza split BEFORE their vow renewal ceremony, according to the groom's mother
item.description: Married At First Sight's Telv Williams and Sarah Roza left fans swooning as they made a commitment to each other at their vow renewal ceremony.
item.content:encoded:
Married At First Sight's Telv Williams and Sarah Roza left fans swooning as they made a commitment to each other at their vow renewal ceremony.

But Daily Mail Australia can exclusively reveal that the couple's fairytale ending may have been completely staged for the cameras - as they had allegedly ALREADY split.

Telv's mother claimed this week that her son was encouraged by producers to take part in the ceremony, despite telling them the relationship was already over.

Scroll down for video 

Daily Mail Australia can exclusively reveal that Telv Williams and Sarah Roza's fairytale ending on MAFS may have been staged for the cameras - as they had allegedly ALREADY split

'They (producers) were coercing him into doing something which he basically didn't want and that was to do the re-commitment ceremony,' claimed Telv's mother, Tracey Bamblett Onus.

'He didn't even want to re-commit.'

Tracey, who was featured on the 'meet the parents' episode of MAFS, alleged her son was 'asked to stay' on Channel Nine's top-rated program. 

Telv's mother, Tracey Bamblett Onus, claimed that her son was encouraged by producers to take part in the ceremony, despite telling them the relationship was already over

'They asked him to stay because of the show,' she claimed.

Tracey believed that the purpose of this request was so that Telv could take part in the vow renewal ceremony.

Despite recent claims from a friend of Sarah's that they split on Valentine's Day, Telv's mother said they actually broke up in December.

And, according to Tracey, her son wanted to exit the 'experiment' even earlier.

'He wanted to leave the show in November,' she revealed, adding that Telv stayed in a separate apartment to his wife for a week during filming.

Good acting? Telv's mother claimed producers 'coerced' her son into the vow renewal ceremony with Sarah, even though he didn't want to take part

While filming her brief appearance on the show, Tracey admitted things were definitely strained between Telv and Sarah.

She claimed that Sarah needed to be consoled after becoming 'very, very upset'.

Tracey emphasised that she did like Sarah, but admitted her son was 'walking on eggshells' around her.

She explained that Telv didn't think he was going to be paired with a woman who was 'so demanding' in a relationship. 

Things were strained! Telv's mother Tracey appeared on Married At First Sight during a 'meet the family' episode. She remarked that Sarah seemed 'very, very upset' during filming

While Telv has remained tight-lipped about MAFS and the negative publicity he has attracted, his mother said he was coping well despite feeling 'used' by producers.

'I suppose his feeling... what's the word, when you feel pushed into things?' she said, before adding that the show has been a difficult experience for him.

'He's not very happy about the way it all happened (but) he takes things in his stride and doesn't like to dwell on them too much.' 

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Channel Nine for comment. 

Struggles: While Telv has remained tight-lipped about MAFS and the negative publicity he has attracted, his mother said he was coping well despite feeling 'used' by producers

item.title: PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Move over Barbarella! Blac Chyna shows off her bombshell curves in cut-out bikini and sparkly boots for futuristic photoshoot
item.description: Looking like a comic-book heroine Chyna, 29, also added a personal touch by rocking a sleek pink bobbed wig as she posed near some boulders in Topanga Canyon.
item.content:encoded:
She's been keeping her figure in check with grueling workouts after a little nip and tuck in 2017.

And clearly proud of the fruits of her labor Blac Chyna posed for a futuristic photo shoot outside of Los Angeles on Monday in just a two-piece and thigh-high boots.

Looking like comic-book heroine Barbarella Chyna, 29, it was a sexy look for the former E! star and she also added a personal touch in a sleek pink bobbed wig.

Babe-arella! Blac Chyna showed off her figure during a sexy photo shoot just outside of Los Angeles on Monday 

Chyna's white bikini featured a halterneck style top with cut-out detail under the bust and high-cut briefs.

Some sparkly silver slouchy boots added extra space age chic. 

The mother-of-two flaunted her flat tummy and generous booty in the outfit while posing in front of some boulders in Topanga Canyon. 

Before facing cameras the former Rob & Chyna star wore a black Versace robe and fluffy slippers. 

Curves on show: Chyna's white bikini featured a halterneck style top with cut-out detail under the bust and high-cut briefs

Sitting pretty: The mother-of-two showed off her toned tummy in the sexy two piece

Hands on: Chyna, 29, had an assistant help to oil her up for the shoot

Last year Chyna - born Angela Renée White - revealed in court documents that she had cosmetic procedures 'including a breast and butt reduction as well as liposuction around her belly button'. 

During their very public breakup in July 2017 Rob had angrily outed his ex on social media claiming he paid $100,000 so Chyna could get her post-baby body worked on. 

But in her lawsuit against her ex, Chyna labeled it 'minor surgery' and claimed that Rob had jeopardized her sponsorship deals by revealing details about her post-baby surgery.

Nailed it! The reality star threw on an oversize graphic-print T-shirt and platform heels as she walked with her team

Pretty in pastels: Chyna channeled Kim Kardashian with her pale pink locks

Sky-high: Chyna strutted her stuff in towering platform heels

The legal documents stated: 'Accordingly, the manner in which Rob Kardashian revealed Ms White’s personal medical information jeopardized Ms White’s endorsement deals with several weight loss, fitness and diet companies – that all pay Ms White to promote their products on social media.

'Ms White underwent minor cosmetic procedures including a breast and butt reduction as well as a small amount of liposuction around her belly button.' 

The former video vixen is now dating 18-year-old rapper YBN Almighty Jay. 

Designer darling: Before facing cameras Chyna wrapped up in a black Versace robe

Ready for her close-up: Chyna kept comfortable in some furry slides before the shoot

Boots on! The former Rob & Chyna star slipped on some slouchy glittery boots

And she seems to be on better terms with Rob who she continues to co-parent Dream, one, with.

The buxom beauty wished the youngest Kardashian a happy birthday as he turned 31 earlier this month. 

Chyna is also the mother of five-year-old king Cairo, her son with ex Tyga. 

New romance: The former video vixen is now dating 18-year-old rapper YBN Almighty Jay

These boots were made for walking: The ex fiancee of Rob Kardashian was ready for action once her snazzy footwear was in place

On a budget? The star rifled through a suitcase of garments on the side of the road

Looking like comic-book heroine Barbarella Chyna, 29, it was a sexy look for the former E! star and she also added a personal touch in a sleek pink bobbed wig.

item.title: 'I want five kids!' Olivia Bentley reveals her baby and wedding plans with boyfriend Digby Edgley... as she compares Made In Chelsea to 'therapy'
item.description: The Made In Chelsea star has revealed she wants to get married and have five children with her 24-year-old boyfriend in an interview with Ok! Magazine.
item.content:encoded:
Viewers have watched their love story unfold on Made In Chelsea, with Digby Edgley professing his love to Olivia Bentley at the end of series 14. 

And now Liv has revealed she wants to get married and have five children with her 24-year-old boyfriend in an interview with Ok! Magazine. 

The reality star, 22, who has been dating the hunk for six months, added that starring in the hit E4 show is like 'therapy' for the couple and they've been 'inseparable' ever since starting their romance. 

Loved-up: Olivia Bentley has revealed she wants to get married and have five children with her boyfriend in an interview with Ok! Magazine

'We talk about moving in together – I think in a year, if we haven’t killed each other by then,' she said.

'And we joke about getting married and having kids; he’s going to buy me a big diamond ring, and I want five children!’ 

Shedding light on the relationship, Digby added: 'In other relationships I always felt very much in control, but for the first time ever I feel like I’m on a par with Liv. 

Sweet: The reality star, 22, who has been dating the hunk for six months, added that starring in the hit E4 show is like 'therapy' and they've been 'inseparable' since starting their romance

Planning the future: Liv said:'We joke about getting married and having kids; he’s going to buy me a big diamond ring, and I want five children!’

'I like the fact she can put me in my place, we’re best friends and there’s constant laughter.'

And while some relationships might quaver under the strain of being broadcast on a reality series, Liv said: 'It’s almost like therapy, in a bizarre way, because you get confronted with stuff and you have to talk about it, which makes you better at voicing things outside of the show.’ 

In the photoshoot, the reality starlet oozed glamour as she slipped into a white lace gown, while her beau teased a glimpse of his rippling muscles by leaving his blue shirt undone.

In another snap the striking blonde donned a slinky teal dress with a sultry thigh split as her boyfriend protectively wrapped his hands around her waist.

She quiffed her cropped locks back and sported a glamorous make-up look.   

Olivia returned to the E4 show last year, after being suspended when she was caught up in a drug scandal.

The starlet, is now one of the series' central figures - with her finding love after a string of failed flings.

Romantic: The happy couple regularly flaunt their relationship and luxurious lifestyle with a slew of loved-up snaps on Instagram

Love story: Read the full story in Ok! Magazine- out now

She first embarked on romance with show favourite Francis Boulle, but she soon called things off to pursue his friend and MIC co-star Frederik Ferrer. 

However, they also parted ways soon after, due to an incident concerning new cast member Mimi Bouchard.

Olivia had taken issue with Fred when it transpired he had commented that show newbie Mimi was attractive.

The happy couple regularly flaunt their relationship and luxurious lifestyle with a slew of loved-up snaps on Instagram.

Earlier this month,  Digby posted a snap of the two of them reclining in adjacent baths, sipping on champagne. 

Read the full story in Ok! Magazine- out now.
item.dc:abstract: Viewers have watched their love story unfold on Made In Chelsea, with Digby Edgley professing his love to Olivia Bentley at the end of series 14. And now Liv has revealed she wants to get married and have five children with her 24-year-old boyfriend in an interview with Ok! Magazine. The reality star, 22, who has been dating the hunk for six months, added that starring in the hit E4 show is like 'therapy' for the couple and they've been 'inseparable' ever since starting their romance.

item.title: Russell Crowe, 53, looks almost unrecognisable with a bushy grey beard and unruly hair as he reunites with his glamorous ex-wife Danielle for their son's basketball game
item.description: The Gladiator star, 53, cut a relaxed figure in a loose-fitting black polo shirt and shorts as he enjoyed a family day out
item.content:encoded:
As an actor, he is a master of disguise.

And Russell Crowe was hardly recognisable as he attended his son's basketball game with his ex-wife Danielle Spencer in Malabar, Sydney on Thursday.

The Gladiator star, 53, cut a relaxed figure in a loose-fitting black polo shirt and shorts as he enjoyed a family day out.

Russell Crowe, 53, looked almost unrecognisable with a bushy grey beard and unruly hair as he reunited with his glamorous ex-wife Danielle for their son's sports game in Sydney on Thursday

Looking very different from his early 2000s heyday, Russell shared a tender moment with his son at the sports game.

The Australian actor swapped his signature Hollywood style for a bushy grey beard and sunglasses as he blended in with the crowds.

He was also seen enjoying a friendly conversation with his ex-wife Danielle.

Later on, the L.A. Confidential star appeared rather windswept as he climbed into his luxury vehicle and drove away. 

Friendly exes: The Gladiator star, 53, cut a relaxed figure in a loose-fitting black polo shirt and shorts as he enjoyed a family day out

Family man: Looking very different from his early 2000s heyday, Russell shared a tender moment with his son at the sports game

Whoosh! The L.A. Confidential star appeared rather windswept as he climbed into his vehicle

Russell and Danielle - who share two children, Tennyson and Charles - reportedly finalised their divorce in the middle of last year.

The Sunday Telegraph claimed that Danielle walked away from the marriage with '$20million in the bank' and ownership of their $11million Rose Bay mansion.

The former couple had bought the Eastern Suburbs property in 2011, just months before separating after nine years of marriage.

Is that you? The Australian actor swapped his signature Hollywood style for a bushy grey beard

Still close: He was also seen sharing a friendly conversation with his ex-wife Danielle Spencer

Going solo: Russell and Danielle - who share two children, Tennyson and Charles - reportedly finalised their divorce in the middle of last year

Reports: The Sunday Telegraph claimed that Danielle walked away from the marriage with '$20million in the bank' and ownership of their $11million Rose Bay mansion

Russell is holding a 'divorce auction' next month, selling some of his most cherished possessions and Hollywood memorabilia.

The sale at Sotheby's will feature 223 items, including a chariot from the film Gladiator, and is listed as 'The Art of Divorce'.

Watches, art and jewellery belonging to his ex-wife will also be included in the sale on April 7th - the couple's wedding anniversary and Russell's 54th birthday.

Going, going, gone! Russell is holding a 'divorce auction' next month, selling some of his most cherished possessions and Hollywood memorabilia

Moving on: The sale at Sotheby's will feature 223 items, including a chariot from the film Gladiator, and is listed as 'The Art of Divorce'

Important date: Watches, art and jewellery belonging to his ex-wife will also be included in the sale on April 7th - the couple's wedding anniversary and Russell's 54th birthday

Later, he enjoyed a friendly conversation with Danielle, who is the mother of his two children, before driving away in his luxury car.

item.title: Menacing moment two sisters armed with baseball bats prepare to beat a female motorist in road rage attack that left the victim with a broken nose, staples and stitches in her head
item.description: Mikaela Barboza, 26, and her acquaintance took video before and after Barboza said she was attacked by two women with baseball bats in South Florida on Thursday after she 'cut them off.'
item.content:encoded:
Mikaela Barboza, 26, and her acquaintance took video before and after Barboza said she was attacked by two women with baseball bats in South Florida on Thursday after she 'cut them off'

A woman was beaten by two women with baseball bats in a South Florida parking lot on Thursday after she said she cut one of the attackers off while driving on US Route 441.

Mikaela Barboza, 26, took video of one woman approaching her with a baseball bat and yelling obscenities, which ended after showing a second woman approaching and swinging a bat in her direction before the clip cutout.

A second video taken by Barboza's acquaintance, according to the Miami Herald, showed two of the women wrestling on the ground with the third appearing to hit one of the women with a bat, before bystanders eventually intervened.

'This was because I cut them off,' Barboza wrote with a post sharing the videos and graphic images of her injuries on Facebook. 'Then they made it about race after they beat me with two bats.'

Barboza was left with a broken nose and seven staples and seven stitches in her head, following the incident.  

Barboza took video of one woman approaching her with a baseball bat (pictured) and yelling

'My nose is the worst of it,' she told the Herald on Sunday. 'I can’t even breathe out of it.'  

Barboza told the Herald she was driving on the federal highway on her way to a meeting when she cut off one of the women seen in the videos. 

That woman started yelling at her, and she said another driver yelled, 'You cut off my sister. That’s disrespectful.'

Barboza said that's when she pulled over in a nearby parking lot, in fear for her safety. 

Barboza was left with a broken nose and seven staples and seven stitches in her head, following the incident

Barboza shared graphic images of her injuries to Facebook, in a post calling for justice

She got seven staples and seven stiches in her head, following the incident on Thursday

She said the women followed her and blocked her car in as she called the police, and then got of her car.

Video shows one woman in a floral dress approaching Barboza with a baseball bat in her hand. 

'I don’t got time for this. I got a kid, bruh,' Barboza said, as the women gets closer.

'I got a kid too,' the woman said, coming even closer.'I don’t give a f***.'

The woman in the dress yelled expletives at Barboza, as a small boy can be seen in the passenger side of her SUV, watching the events unfold. 

The woman in the dress yelled expletives at Barboza, as a small boy can be seen in the passenger side of her SUV, watching the events unfold

The woman then threatened to 'f*** her a** up,' before the edge of the camera frame showed another woman approaching, with her own bat in hand

The woman then threatened to 'f*** her a** up,' as the edge of the camera frame showed another woman approaching, with her own bat in hand.

'I’m not scared,' Barboza said, before her video ends with the camera flying from her hand just after it caught a glimpse of the second woman swinging the bat toward the lens. Barboza saud second woman, in a red sweatshirt, hit her in the head with a metal bat.

A second video then showed two women on the ground wrestling. The footage isn't incredibly clear, Barboza said it was her and the first woman in the floral dress.

'We were kind of wrestling and the other sister with the other bat came over and started beating me over the head,' Barboza said.

In the second video, one of the women can be heard shouting, 'Don’t talk about black people,' but Barboza told the Herald she did not say anything racist to the women, on of whom can be heard calling her a 'cracker a**' in the first video. 

'Anybody who knows me KNOWS I don’t have a racist bone in my body,' Barboza wrote on social media, in the post sharing the videos.

Barboza's video ended after showing a second woman approaching with a bat in hand

'My nose is the worst of it,' she told the Herald on Sunday; She's seen here in a photo shared to social media from before the attack 

Bystanders eventually broke up the fight and the two women left before law enforcement showed up to the scene.

Barboza filed a police report and said she planned to press charges. 

'This was totally uncalled for and justice will be served,' Barboza wrote on Facebook, adding, 'Ps: My daughter was NOT in my car.'

The Broward County Sheriff's Office told DailyMail.com the alleged incident is still under investigation.

No suspects have been named by the Sheriff's office and no charges have been filed at this time. 

Bystanders eventually broke up the fight and the two women left before law enforcement showed up to the scene; no suspects have been named and no charges have been filed
item.dc:abstract: Mikaela Barboza (right), 26, and her acquaintance took video before and after Barboza said she was attacked by two women with baseball bats in South Florida on Thursday after she 'cut them off' on US Route 441. Barboza suffered a broken nose, stitches and staples in her head after the brawl. The Broward County Sheriff's Office told DailyMail.com the alleged incident is under investigation, with no suspects named or charged at this time. A still image from the video Barboza said she took on Thursday is seen, at left.

item.title: Heavily pregnant Miranda Kerr cradles her prominent baby bump as she steps out in a fun and flirty floral minidress for lunch with pals
item.description: The 34-year-old Australian model, married to Snapchat co-founder Evan Spiegel, looked radiant as she stepped out to dine with pals in Hollywood on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
She's excitedly preparing for the birth of her first baby with billionaire husband Evan Speigel, giving her seven-year-old son Flynn a younger sibling.

And Miranda Kerr looked radiant as she stepped out for lunch with pals in Hollywood on Sunday, showing off her prominent baby bump in a black floral minidress.

The 34-year-old Australian model wore a black coat over her daringly short number, which she teamed with a pair of box fresh white tennis shoes.

Baby! Heavily pregnant Miranda Kerr stepped out for lunch with pals in Hollywood on Sunday

Shielding her eyes from the Southern California sunshine with a pair of oversized cat eye sunglasses, the brunette beauty wore her brunette locks in shoulder-length curls, while she highlighted her natural good locks with a smudge of red lipstick.

The stunning beauty kept her accessories minimal, sporting a delicate pendant, while her a glittering diamond sparkler was worn on her ring finger.  

Miranda recently explained that her son Flynn, whom she shares with her ex-husband Orlando Bloom, was so eager to have a little brother or sister that he demanded to know if mother was pregnant only a day after she got married to Evan.

Bump: The 34-year-old model displays her prominent baby bump in a black floral minidress

Describing the situation last month on Jimmy Kimmel Live!, Miranda recalled: 'Evan and I had been together for a while, and [Flynn] was like, "When are we going to have a baby brother or sister?" We were like, "We've got to get married first."'

'The day after the wedding, he comes running in, and he's like, "Mommy, is it in there?" I was like, "Honey, give it a minute!"' 

Miranda and Snapchat co-founder Evan made their debut as a couple in June 2015 after first meeting at a Louis Vuitton dinner in New York City in 2014.

Black and white: The Australian beauty wore a black coat over her daringly short number, which she teamed with a pair of box fresh white tennis shoes

The couple tied the knot in an intimate backyard ceremony at Evan's home in the Brentwood area of Los Angeles in May 2017, in front of just 45 family and friends.

Despite their divorce, Miranda has maintained a friendly relationship with British actor Orlando, who is in an on-off romance with Katy Perry. 

The former flames were married in a romantic ceremony in July 2010, but announced that they were going their separate ways in 2013. 

Happily married: Miranda and Evan Spiegel tied the knot in an intimate backyard ceremony in May 2017, in front of just 45 family and friends. Pictured in November 2016

item.title: Consciously uncoupled Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin look every inch the modern family as they enjoy dinner with son Moses in London
item.description: Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin remained every inch the modern family as they headed out for dinner, along with their son Moses, in London on Sunday night.
item.content:encoded:
They have had one of the most amicable splits in Hollywood history. 

And, exactly four years after their 'conscious uncoupling', Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin remained every inch the modern family as they headed out for dinner, along with their son Moses, in London on Sunday night. 

The exes - who have both found love in different relationships - still looked the best of friends as they dined in the British capital, along with Chris' Coldplay bandmate Will Champion. 

Amicable exes: Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin remained every inch the modern family as they headed out for dinner, along with their son Moses, in London on Sunday night

Chris and Gwyneth even looked to complement their styles, with both opting for off-duty, all-black outfits for the occasion.

Goop founder Gwyneth, 45, sported combat trousers and white trainers, though wrapped up in a smart, double-breasted coat.

Fix You hitmaker Chris stayed true to his rocker roots in jeans and a leather jacket, finished with a beanie hat and the offbeat choice of walking shoes. 

On good terms: The former spouses still looked the best of friends as they dined in the British capital, along with Chris' Coldplay bandmate Will Champion

His style was loosely mimicked by trendy youngster Moses, 11, who sported a beanie like his dad, paired with a simple tee, padded bomber jacket and jeans. 

Earlier this year Gwyneth said that Chris has become 'like a brother', adding that their cordial divorce was to ensure their children Moses and Apple, 13, remained as 'unscathed as possible'.

Appearing on The Late Show With Stephen Colbert, the host noted that she remained close with her ex-husband, prompting Gwyneth to respond: 'Very much so. He's like my brother. Very familial. It's nice. Great. 

Matching! Chris and Gwyneth even looked to complement their styles, with both opting for off-duty, all-black outfits for the occasion

Smart meets casual! Goop founder Gwyneth, 45, sported combat trousers and white trainers, though wrapped up in a double-breasted coat

Signature style: Fix You hitmaker Chris stayed true to his rocker roots in jeans and a leather jacket, finished with a beanie hat and the offbeat choice of walking shoes

Colbert quipped that it was kind of weird saying someone you had children with is like a brother.

'Which would explain the divorce,' Paltrow joked. 'Just kidding,' she added. 

Her comments came shortly after she announced her engagement to Glee co-creator Brad Falchuk in early January, just weeks after she was spotted enjoying a family holiday with her ex-husband and their children in Antigua. 

Meanwhile, Chris, 41, is in a relationship with Fifty Shades of Grey star Dakota Johnson, 28,  

Just like dad! Chris' style was loosely mimicked by trendy youngster Moses, 11, who sported a beanie like his dad, paired with a simple tee, padded bomber jacket and jeans

Parenting role models: Earlier this year Gwyneth said that Chris has become 'like a brother', adding that their amicable split was to ensure their kids remained as 'unscathed as possible'

The exes - who have both found love in different relationships - still looked the best of friends as they dined in the British capital, along with Chris' Coldplay bandmate Will Champion.
